BuildingInstruction class

class building_instruction.BuildingInstruction(pipe_id, required_fit_positions, possible_att_pipe_positions, recommended_attachment_pos, layout_completed=False)

Bases: object

Contains instructions for building a layout.

pipe_id

ID of pipe that needs to be placed in the layout.

Type: int

required_fit_positions

Position where fittings need to be placed.

Type: DirectedConnection

possible_att_pipe_positions

Trail containing node positions that a pipe of this layout would occupy. Used for checking if position of a motion event is valid for attachment or pipe placement.

Type: Trail

recommended_attachment_pos

Recommended placement position of attachment, determined by an algorithm.

Type: Pos

layout_completed

If the layout is completed.

Type: bool
